title: Open Banking consent forms (PSD2, FDX, CDR)
dataVerified: Customer name, account access scope, third-party app, expiration
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Tamper-evident consent records. Domain binding verifies bank + third-party. Regulatory compliance (EU PSD2, UK CMA Order, AU CDR). Prevents unauthorized account access. GDPR/privacy compliance. Consent revocation audit trail.
